scenario_text.value: Where did you go, Saki? I was so worried!

Sorry... I was alone before I knew it. Of
course I looked for you...

You’re always like this! I’m sick of how
selfish you always get!

You’re always the same! Moving to the beat of
your own drum, regardless of others.

You might be having fun, but what about the
troubles you cause for everyone else?

You know that none of them can stand how
narcissistic you are.

That’s why everyone around you disappears,
one after another.
Stop... Please, stop. I’m begging you...
You don’t know a single thing about Saki.

Saki may seem flighty, but she really pays
attention to all kinds of things.

Anyone who knows her gets that much. Don’t
talk like you have any clue about it!
